text.section:
If the Secretary finds that a tier 2 plant does not meet the signage requirement under § 9.5-302(b)(1) of this subtitle, the Secretary shall:
Issue a stop sale order; and
Mark or tag the plant in a conspicuous manner.
The Secretary shall give written notice of a finding made under subsection (a) of this section to the owner, tenant, or person in charge of the premises.
A stop sale order issued under this section shall remain in effect until the required signage is posted.
